reports.label: Unspecified Candidate Issue in TACACS+ Over TLS Definitions
reports.explanation: A candidate issue is flagged in the analysis with no specific details provided; this may indicate an oversight or an unfinished note regarding the definitions in Section 2 of RFC 9887 for TACACS+ over TLS.
justification: The analysis includes a candidate issue entry with missing label and details, indicating an unresolved or underspecified point. (E1)
